My name is Nur, I'm a digital designer, currently working full time as a freelance designer (Ai user), with full enthusiasm to create various types of logos and vector illustrations.
  Far from designing and building things, I like food, plants and vacations.
  If you are interested in working with me, please invite me for a 1-to-1 project.

I move between the traditional and the digital media. I have experience in Branding, logo, editorial design, covers, posters, flyers, business cards, social media content, advertising  short video ads,  illustration and product design. I help you promote your brand from a new visible, active and visually committed way to today's society.

about:
Diplomata presso il Liceo Classico A. Banfi e laureata presso la N.A.B.A. Nuova Accademia delle Belle Arti, in Media Design & Arti Multimediali, Lavinia Cerato lavora presso il PolygonStudio di Sulbiate (MB) da 5 anni.
  Fotografa, illustratrice e grafica da 15 anni. Passione per l'editing video. Amante della scrittura e affamata di cultura.
  Creatrice e fondatrice di GlassLife, Terrarium ovvero ecosistemi autonomi sottovetro.

about:
Hi! I am a Graphic designer, based in Karachi, Pakistan. I am self taught passionate Graphic designer and have  almost 3 years of experience in this field.

about: I've been a Graphic Designer for the past 23 years now, and have been freelance for the last 10. I've previously worked in many genres of design, gaining a vast array of experience. These have included a print studio, a banner firm and an Architect firm, covering everything from logos to large format, hand sketching to vector design. I am very passionate about my work, and love how every new project is completely different, it’s what keeps the job so enjoyable!

about:
Myself Bhupendra Nipane.
  I like to create simple & minimal designs. I try to play with the letters and concentrate on the essence of the message in a simple way. My portfolio is a sample of the trend I follow.
  I accept 1 to 1 projects as long as the client has an idea in mind of what he wants. But first, make sure that my style suits your needs.
  Feel free to leave a message...
  dribbble - https://dribbble.com/bhupnip
tags: ['Logo design']
reviews: ['Very talented designer. Great to work with!', 'We knew at the first logo design that Bhupendra was a top candidate. He was very responsive by getting variations back to us very soon. We will use him again next time we need any work that is in his wheelhouse.', 'great designer. took instruction ', 'Very creative individual... We all loved his work and professional manner!', 'I loved the geometric shapes of the design and the balance it portrayed. Also the designer is amazing, he always asks you what he can do better and he does it, listening to what you have to say and following your style']

about:
I'm a web designer/illustrator. From a young age I have always been passionate about the arts. I have been forever drawing and inventing new and wonderful things.
  I soon got my first computer and discovered how to make graphics digitally. I have continued to fuse my passion with art and computers.
  My ability to switch from designer to coder has allowed me to become a multimedia specialist.
  This means I am able to handle any task I'm given, web, multimedia, branding, or an illustration.

about:
I am a graphic designer from West Java, Indonesia. Playing a pencil on paper is also my activity. to make handwriting, illustrations, or funny icons.
  Classic style is my favorite, like my love for blues, and rock n roll. But it doesn't rule out the possibility for me to love the modern style.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

Graphic Designosaur.

about: I am a highly passionate graphic designer. I am serving my clients from 6 years as a Logo Designer as well as trained dozens of designers in my town. I have helped more than 7K+ businesses. As a designer, my mission is to contribute in the success of my clients through providing cutting edge designs :) As a person, I love to create unique art, explore natural beauty and making strong connections.

about:
I am a Brazilian designer  graduated from the Federal University and the Instituto de Leiria in Portugal.
  I started my internship in projects at Siemens in 2010, when I was 19 years old. I worked at Motorola and in startup launches. In total, around the world, I've worked on projects in 8 countries: United States, France, Denmark, Spain, Brazil, Canada, Portugal and England.
  I recently started working on 99 designs. For more information, you can contact me by direct message.
